name: Serverless Marketplace
desc: A serverless online marketplace where users can buy and sell used items. Browse items or create and edit your own. Post on the message board or chat with other buyer/sellers.

name: Web Scraper Battle Simulator
desc: See which Star Wars characters would win in battle. Details are scraped from the Star Wars Fandom, battles are determined via a custom battle calculator, and stories are generated via ChatGPT's API

name: Crowd Sourced Travel Planner
desc: Capstone project made with two teammates at OSU. Web app that allows users to plan trips based on other users' experiences. Made with Flask, Next.js, MySQL.
